body_html:
Can someone comment on the state here? This was reverted? Why?

What broadcasting is supposed to work?

E.g. I get the error:

Dimension 2 in both shapes must be equal, but are 9001 and 1 for '.../Select' (op: 'Select') with input shapes: [?,?,1], [?,?,9001], [1,1,1]

So the cond can not be broadcasted?

Even when I have cond in the correct shape, I still get the error:

ValueError: Dimension 2 in both shapes must be equal, but are 9001 and 1 for '.../Select' (op: 'Select') with input shapes: [?,?,?], [?,?,9001], [1,1,1].

So also e cannot be broadcasted?

What can be broadcasted?

body:
Can someone comment on the state here? This was reverted? Why?

What broadcasting is supposed to work?

E.g. I get the error:

`Dimension 2 in both shapes must be equal, but are 9001 and 1 for '.../Select' (op: 'Select') with input shapes: [?,?,1], [?,?,9001], [1,1,1]`

So the `cond` can not be broadcasted?

Even when I have `cond` in the correct shape, I still get the error:

`ValueError: Dimension 2 in both shapes must be equal, but are 9001 and 1 for '.../Select' (op: 'Select') with input shapes: [?,?,?], [?,?,9001], [1,1,1].`

So also `e` cannot be broadcasted?

What can be broadcasted?
